content: You can add multiple email addresses to the TO field. Just add multiple ones from your contacts or separate the email addresses with a comma "," if you are typing them in.
creator: firefox1670

content: Thanks, I had tried that earlier and that didn't work. Others had suggested in other threads to hit enter and that would get a new field, but all that did was take me to the subject field. I tried your suggestion again just now, and it did work. I'm pretty sure the issue was between the keyboard and the chair earlier, so thanks for getting me to test it again! :) Scuter
creator: scuter

content:
Who, or what, is "resist kit"? I did try Google and they told me about dye fabrics and resistors. So that did not help at all. I would not ask but I think that might be critical here, as it sounds like someone promoting something that has nothing to do with either Thunderbird or Proton so they probably left out something important from the instructions.

Eventually I got to this https://realitycheck.radio/digitalid-au/ which to all intents and purposes is some sort of money making scheme stating the obvious with a good sized sprinkling of fear mongering from a couple of antivaxers. As they want my information to begin to share the very special information they have to offer I stopped at the front door to the website. But the Company behind it is NZ MEDIA HOLDINGS 2023 LIMITED details here https://www.companyhub.nz/companyDetails.cfm?nzbn=9429051146498

The company has two directors. Claire DEEKS https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Claire_Deeks and Alia BLAND https://www.livingfreefestival.org/speakers-artists/alia-bland

So I guess you have to tell us what is is those instructions say to do so we can help you though the process but the following would be the normal approach. If you already have Thunderbird installed.

I suggest first that you ensure you have a paid account with Proton as Thunderbird and Proton do not interact without the Proton Bridge and that comes only with paid accounts.

  1. Pay for an account with proton https://proton.me/mail/pricing
  2. Switch your existing account/s to use Protonhttps://proton.me/easyswitch
  3. Download the bridge https://proton.me/mail/downlo
  4. Install the bridge
  5. Set up your proton mail accounts with Thunderbird per the Proton instructions. https://proton.me/support/protonmail-bridge-clients-windows-thunderbird
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
Thank you Matt. Sorry to put you to those searches. Yes "The Digital ID Resist Kit" is put out by NZ Media but promoted by ACA Aligned Council of Australia because of the Australian introduction of the Under 16 Social Media Ban in Dec 2025. It should be easily available on the Internet. The instructions did not all follow as set out but mainly was helpful. 

I paid a 2 year subscription of A$306.96 on December 29 and went about transferring 3 Gmail accounts and 1 Hotmail account into the Thunderbird and its provider account Proton. 

As of this morning everything was in and coming into both the Thunderbird and Proton and under the names of 4 emails and seemed useful and easy to manage. Today the Thunderbird info has disappeared and I can only access the Proton account. One Gmail didn't seem to complete its transfer yesterday and I now I am on the merry-go-round of being asked by Microsoft to login and complete the their password to allow Proton to access their accounts.You mention "bridge" and I did try to download it but got the response Page not found and Not availala


Sent with Proton Mail secure email.
creator: bglenrae

content: Matt I couldn't finish that - but from looking promising yesterday a real problem now. Glenrae
